scripts.qa:real: set -e && echo 'Gate A: Build' && npx tsc --noEmit && npm run build && echo 'Gate B: IBGE' && node scripts/verify-ibge-localidades.mjs && node scripts/verify-ibge-indicators.mjs && echo 'Gate C: GeoSignals' && node scripts/verify-geosignals.mjs && echo 'Gate D: Anti-Simulated' && node scripts/verify-real-only-no-simulated.mjs
scripts.qa:phase2: echo 'Gate A: Build' && npx tsc --noEmit && npm run build && echo 'Gate E: Connectors' && node scripts/verify-connectors-stubs.mjs
scripts.qa:timeseries168: echo 'Gate A: Build' && npx tsc --noEmit && npm run build && echo 'Gate T: Timeseries' && node scripts/verify-timeseries168.mjs
scripts.review: npm run build && npx serve dist
